full_description:
Baseus SUYT-D0G Control Smartphone Handheld Folding Gimbal Stabilizer

Baseus SUYT-D0G Control Smartphone Handheld Folding Gimbal Stabilizer helps you capture smooth and stable videos with your smartphone. It features a three-axis motor and metal arms that provide anti-shake performance and a comfortable grip. It also has a built-in 4500mAh battery that can last up to 12 hours of continuous use. You can easily switch between horizontal and vertical shooting modes with one key, and use the dolly zoom function to create cinematic effects. You can also connect your smartphone to the gimbal via wireless 4.0 and use the app to access multiple intelligent functions such as smart follow, time-lapse, panorama, etc. The gimbal supports phones with a width of 58-92mm and a thickness of below 9.8mm, and it has a Type-C port for fast charging. The gimbal is made of PC+Aluminum alloy material and has a compact size that can be collapsed or stretched according to your needs. Baseus SUYT-D0G Control Smartphone Handheld Folding Gimbal Stabilizer is the perfect companion for your smartphone photography and videography. Whether you are traveling, vlogging, live streaming, or just having fun, this gimbal will help you record every moment with ease and style.
